resources.string: Install separate or all overlays here
Some overlays were updated. Install them.
Changing background requires all overlays to be re-installed. This will take some time and the process will start once you click confirm on the previous screen.
Credits to Projekt Development Team & SlimRoms Ltd for the encryption implementation

After you examined the result, and optionally sent an error log if something failed, you need to manually reboot to finish the installation!\n\nYou don\'t need to reboot if all overlays failed to install.

One reason apps fails to install is that the app version doesn\'t match the overlays version. We usually update the theme and add support for new versions within a few days, so please be patient. There\'s an option to send us an error log in the FAB menu.

1. Installing and uninstalling can take a lot of time. Even though it seems stuck, just wait and it\'ll finish.\n\n2. When installing or uninstalling Android overlay some apps might crash. This is expected, and normal. Everything will work fine once you rebooted.
You need to reboot manually to finish uninstall.

The best way to keep all overlays working over time is to disable automatic updates in Play Store, and update your apps when we update the theme. This way the theme code and app code will match, and work.\n\nBefore updating your firmware you must uninstall all active overlays. And if you update an app from Play Store, you need to update the respective overlay.
You can change to your favourite background and accent color before installing overlays. Input any color code you want and create that personal feeling!
Swift Installer makes your system dark, and personal. Let\'s start with a guide on how to use it…

A theme contain overlays, and it\'s the overlay that applies on top of an app and themes it. Overlays gets installed as APK\'s on your device. By pressing \'Give\' you acknowledge and accept this. \n\n We also need storage permission as we temporarily place the APK on the storage before installing it. Press \'Give\' to grant the permission.
Please connect to internet to show the FAQ
You can theme 164 apps with Swift Installer. Follow every instruction carefully throughout the installer app.
Notification fix makes black text visible, e.g. WhatsApp notifications.

When using dark notifications: Some notification texts are hardcoded black, e.g. WhatsApp notifications. This fix adds a shadow around all text, making black text visible. You can see how it looks in the preview above.
A preview of dark notifications with sender name fix
A preview of normal dark notifications

The first install will require you to install all apps manually, and this means a lot of clicking. Once the first install is done, it will all be much smoother and faster due to our update system. There is a learning curve, but once you get a hang of it, you\'ll find it easy to use.
Please note that we, due to stability reasons, advice not to use native Samsung themes or Substratum overlays together with Swift Installer.
